A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As with any star wars move\, everyone was going to go see it. However\, the plot just didn't sit right with me; and as a result\, I kind of felt both disappointed and underwhelmed. It did have a good comedic dialogue which I found enjoyable. Yet\, it just didn't make sense and some parts of it were completely unnecessary\, if not confusing and convoluted.
